entry: TRAPINCH’s nest is a sloped, bowl-like pit dug in sand. This POKéMON patiently waits for prey to tumble down the pit. Its giant jaws have enough strength to crush even boulders.

name: trapinch
entry: Trapinch is a patient hunter. It digs an inescapable pit in a desert and waits for its prey to come tumbling down. This Pokémon can go a whole week without access to any water.

name: trevenant
entry: People fear it due to a belief that it devours any who try to cut down trees in its forest, but to the Pokémon it shares its woods with, it’s kind.

name: trevenant
entry: It can control trees at will. It will trap people who harm the forest, so they can never leave.

name: tropius
entry: It flies by flapping its broad leaves and gives the sweet, delicious fruit around its neck to children.

name: tropius
entry: It lives in tropical jungles. The bunch of fruit around its neck is delicious. The fruit grows twice a year.

name: tropius
entry: Delicious fruits grew out from around its neck because it always ate the same kind of fruit.

name: tsareena
entry: A kick from the hardened tips of this Pokémon’s legs leaves a wound in the opponent’s body and soul that will never heal.

name: turtonator
entry: Its exploding shell poses a real danger but is sensitive to moisture. On rainy days, Turtonator takes silent refuge in caves.

name: turtwig
entry: The shell on its back is made of soil. On a very healthy TURTWIG, the shell should feel moist.

name: tympole
entry: They warn others of danger by vibrating their cheeks to create a high-pitched sound.

name: tynamo
entry: These Pokémon move in schools. They have an electricity-generating organ, so they discharge electricity if in danger.

name: tyranitar
entry: A TYRANITAR is so overwhelmingly powerful, it can bring down a whole mountain to make its nest. It roams in mountains seeking new opponents to fight.

name: tyrantrum
entry: Thanks to its gargantuan jaws, which could shred thick metal plates as if they were paper, it was invincible in the ancient world it once inhabited.

name: tyrunt
entry: This Pokémon is selfish and likes to be pampered. It can also inflict grievous wounds on its Trainer just by playing around.

name: tyrunt
entry: Its large jaw has incredible destructive power. Some theories suggest that its restored form is different from its form of long ago.

name: umbreon
entry: When darkness falls, the rings on the body begin to glow, striking fear in the hearts of anyone nearby.

name: umbreon
entry: When agitated, this POKéMON protects itself by spraying poisonous sweat from its pores.

name: unown
entry: Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape appears to have some mean ing.

name: unown
entry: This POKéMON is shaped like ancient text characters. Although research is ongoing, it is a mystery as to which came first, the ancient writings or the various UNOWN.

name: uxie
entry: A Pokémon feared but also respected for stealing away the memories of evildoers. I have found records that suggest Uxie holds dominion over knowledge.

name: vanillish
entry: This hearty Pokémon survived the Ice Age. It’s incredibly popular in very hot regions.

name: vanillish
entry: It blasts enemies with cold air reaching −148 degrees Fahrenheit, freezing them solid. But it spares their lives afterward—it’s a kind Pokémon.

name: vanillish
entry: By drinking pure water, it grows its icy body. This Pokémon can be hard to find on days with warm, sunny weather.

name: vanilluxe
entry: Each of its two heads has a brain, and when they are in agreement, it attacks its enemies by exhaling a violent blizzard.

name: venomoth
entry: The dustlike scales covering its wings are color-coded to indicate the kinds of poison it has.

name: venonat
entry: VENONAT is said to have evolved with a coat of thin, stiff hair that covers its entire body for protection. It possesses large eyes that never fail to spot even miniscule prey.

name: venonat
entry: Its big eyes are actually clusters of tiny eyes. At night, its kind is drawn by light.

name: vigoroth
entry: Its stress level rises if it cannot keep moving constantly. Too much stress makes it feel sick.

name: vileplume
entry: Vileplume has the world’s largest petals. They are used to attract prey that are then doused with toxic spores. Once the prey are immobilized, this Pokémon catches and devours them.

name: volbeat
entry: It lives around clean ponds. At night, its rear lights up. It converses with others by flashing its light.

name: volbeat
entry: It communicates with others by lighting up its rear at night. It loves ILLUMISE’s sweet aroma.

name: volcarona
entry: This Pokémon emerges from a cocoon formed of raging flames. Ancient murals depict Volcarona as a deity of fire.

name: voltorb
entry: Voltorb was first sighted at a company that manufactures Poké Balls. The link between that sighting and the fact that this Pokémon looks very similar to a Poké Ball remains a mystery.

name: vulpix
entry: Both its fur and its tails are beautiful. As it grows, the tails split and form more tails.

name: vulpix
entry: It controls balls of fire. As it grows, its six tails split from their tips to make more tails.

name: wailord
entry: When a small Wailmer is attacked by Sharpedo or Dhelmise, its whole pod works together to protect it.

name: walrein
entry: Walrein’s two massively developed tusks can totally shatter blocks of ice weighing 10 tons with one blow. This Pokémon’s thick coat of blubber insulates it from subzero temperatures.

name: walrein
entry: Walrein swims all over in frigid seawater while crushing icebergs with its grand, imposing tusks. Its thick layer of blubber makes enemy attacks bounce off harmlessly.

name: weavile
entry: One Weavile will trip a Sandshrew and flip it over, and then another Weavile will deal the finishing blow with its sharp claws.

name: weavile
entry: It lives in snowy regions. It carves patterns in trees with its claws as a signal to others.

name: weedle
entry: A WEEDLE has an extremely acute sense of smell. It distinguishes its favorite kinds of leaves from those it dislikes by sniffing with its big red proboscis (nose).

name: weepinbell
entry: Even though it is filled with acid, it does not melt because it also oozes a protective fluid.

name: weezing
entry: Where two kinds of poison gases meet, two KOFFING can fuse into a WEEZING over many years.

name: weezing
entry: Very rarely, a sudden mutation can result in two small KOFFING twins becoming conjoined as a WEEZING.

name: whiscash
entry: It is extremely protective of its territory. If any foe approaches, it attacks using vicious tremors.

name: whismur
entry: It usually murmurs, but starts crying loudly if it senses danger. It stops when its ear covers are shut.

name: whismur
entry: Whismur is very timid. If it starts to cry loudly, it becomes startled by its own crying and cries even harder. When it finally stops crying, the Pokémon goes to sleep, all tired out.

name: whismur
entry: If it senses danger, it scares the foe by crying out with the volume of a jet-plane engine.

name: whismur
entry: It usually murmurs but starts crying loudly if it senses danger. It stops when its ear covers are shut.

name: whismur
entry: Normally, WHISMUR’s voice is very quiet - it is barely audible even if one is paying close attention. However, if this POKéMON senses danger, it starts crying at an earsplitting volume.

name: wimpod
entry: It’s nature’s cleaner—it eats anything and everything, including garbage and rotten things. The ground near its nest is always clean.

name: wimpod
entry: Its habitat varies from beaches to seabeds. A natural scavenger, it will gleefully chow down on anything edible, no matter how rotten.

name: wimpod
entry: Wimpod gather in swarms, constantly on the lookout for danger. They scatter the moment they detect an enemy’s presence.

name: wishiwashi
entry: When it senses danger, its eyes tear up. The sparkle of its tears signals other Wishiwashi to gather.

name: wobbuffet
entry: Wobbuffet does nothing but endure attacks—it won’t attack on its own. However, it won’t endure an attack on its tail. When that happens, the Pokémon will try to take the foe with it using Destiny Bond.

name: wurmple
entry: It loves to eat leaves. If it is attacked by a Starly, it will defend itself with its spiked rear.

name: wurmple
entry: It loves to eat leaves. If it is attacked by a STARLY, it will defend itself with its spiked rear.

name: wynaut
entry: Wynaut can always be seen with a big, happy smile on its face. Look at its tail to determine if it is angry. When angered, this Pokémon will be slapping the ground with its tail.

name: wynaut
entry: It grows strong by pushing up against others en masse. It loves eating sweet fruit.

name: wynaut
entry: A WYNAUT loves to eat sweet fruits. It cleverly picks fruits using its earlike arms. They gather in fruit gardens, drawn by the fragrance.

name: yanma
entry: YANMA is capable of seeing 360 degrees without having to move its eyes. It is a great flier that is adept at making sudden stops and turning midair. This POKéMON uses its flying ability to quickly chase down targeted prey.

name: zangoose
entry: It has feuded with SEVIPER for many generations. Its sharp claws are its biggest weapons.

name: zangoose
entry: Memories of battling its arch-rival SEVIPER are etched into every cell of ZANGOOSE’s body. This POKéMON adroitly dodges attacks with incredible agility.

name: zigzagoon
entry: It marks its territory by rubbing its bristly fur on trees. This variety of Zigzagoon is friendlier and calmer than the kind native to Galar.

name: zoroark
entry: Bonds between these Pokémon are very strong. It protects the safety of its pack by tricking its opponents.

name: zubat
entry: Makes its home in gloomy caves. Atrophied eyes have left this Pokémon blind, so it scans its surroundings via sound waves that it emits from its mouth as it flies.

name: zubat
entry: ZUBAT avoids sunlight because exposure causes it to become unhealthy. During the daytime, it stays in caves or under the eaves of old houses, sleeping while hanging upside down.

name: zygarde
entry: It’s hypothesized that it’s monitoring those who destroy the ecosystem from deep in the cave where it lives.

name: zygarde
entry: Some say it can change to an even more powerful form when battling those who threaten the ecosystem.
